content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole at position (2.5, 2.5)

### Lab at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (3.5, 0.5) which is currently not powered and requires 10 automation science packs to complete the automation research.

### Furnaces at positions(0, 0) and (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0, 0) with coal as fuel, currently has no ingredients to smelt.
- Furnace at position (2, 0) with coal as fuel, currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden chest at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5) which is currently empty.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new pole
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power supply to the lab and ensure it is connected to a power source.

### Errors when the lab requires ingredients
- Make sure to gather the required ingredients (10 automation science packs) before attempting to complete the research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
